meanings.definition: The quality or state of being biconcave.
meanings.sent1: The biconcavity of the lens allows it to focus light properly.
meanings.sent2: The red blood cells' biconcavity helps them move through narrow blood vessels.
meanings.sent3: The biconcavity of the mirror made my reflection look funny.
meanings.sent4: Her smile had a biconcavity that seemed to brighten the room.
meanings.sent5: The artist captured the biconcavity of the bowl in exquisite detail.

meanings.sent1: The contact lens had a smooth biconcavity for comfortable wear.
meanings.sent2: The biconcavity of the cave roof provided a natural shelter.
meanings.sent3: The biconcavity of the pancake made it easy to flip in the pan.
meanings.sent4: The biconcavity of the valley created a stunning landscape view.
meanings.sent5: The biconcavity of the soap bar made it easy to hold in the shower.
